definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale
wide sea and sky (idiom); boundless open vistas/the whole wide world/chatting about everything under the sun
to parade one's wealth/to be ostentatious and extravagant
striding forward with head high (idiom); to walk with spirited and vigorous step/to strut

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the results of the treatment of old Achilles tendon rupture repaired by the fascia lata transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結采用闊筋膜移植治療陳舊性跟腱斷裂的療效。

sentences.english: A:The ceiling is about eight feet high and the door is ten feet wide.
sentences.chinese: 樓底約八英尺高，門面約十英尺闊。

sentences.english: Tianhe not object to Cowboy wide, but Weaver for Huan Firestone .
sentences.chinese: 牛郎不厭天河闊，織女但求凡世歡。

sentences.english: RESULTS By the method of "autogenous broad fascia transplantation and fixation" the esophageal stents can be fixed effectively.
sentences.chinese: 結果自體闊筋膜移植固定法能有效地固定食管支架。

sentences.english: Part of the anterior aspect of the origin of the tensor fascia is subperiosteally stripped from the ilium .
sentences.chinese: 闊筋膜張肌起點前面的一部分從髂骨上骨膜下剝離。

sentences.english: Even at night , it demonstrates its broadness and initiative .
sentences.chinese: 甚至在晚上，它示範它的闊和率先。

sentences.english: The emphasis was helped by the speaker's mouth, which was wide, thin and hand set.
sentences.chinese: 講話人那又闊又薄又緊繃的嘴巴幫助他加強了語氣。

sentences.english: The superficial and deep fascia over the sartorius muscle are divided, medial to the tensor fascia lata muscle.
sentences.chinese: 分離縫匠肌表面的淺深筋膜，達到闊筋膜張肌的內側。

sentences.english: Do you aspire to know the heights, and depths, and lengths, and breadths?
sentences.chinese: 你是否熱望要知道上帝的長闊高深？

sentences.english: Long time no government regarded the earth, found wide as ever.
sentences.chinese: 好久沒有府視大地，發現地不如曾經闊。

sentences.english: For six months or more it's been going on, this correspondence with the rich cunt, Irene.
sentences.chinese: 同這個叫伊雷娜的闊女人的通信一直持續了六個多月。

sentences.english: The anterolateral approach utilizes the interval between the tensor fascia and the gluteus medius.
sentences.chinese: 前外側入路利用了闊筋膜張肌和臀中肌之間的間隙。

sentences.english: After he spent her money he left her and now he's marrying another rich woman.
sentences.chinese: 如今他要和另一個闊女人結婚了。
